db:info.db:title: Qt Wayland Qt Shell Extension
db:info.db:edition: Qt Wayland Compositor | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Provides a shell extension for Qt applications running on a Qt Wayland Compositor.
This module was introduced in Qt 6.3.

db:article.db:para: This module was introduced in Qt 6.3.

db:section.db:title: Summary
db:section.db:para: The QtShell extension provides a way to associate an QtShellSurface with a regular Wayland surface. The QtShell extension is written to support the window management features which are supported by Qt. It may be suitable on a platform where both the compositor and client applications are written with Qt, and where applications are trusted not to abuse features such as manual window positioning and "bring-to-front".
For other use cases, consider using IviApplication or XdgShell instead.
